about.intro: Full-Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience creating web and mobile applications. Specialized in Java, React and React Native, with a focus on scalable architectures and clean code. Brazilian Army Medal for technological contribution.

experiences.title: Mid-Level Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: I develop web and mobile applications with React, React Native and Java Spring Boot. I'm responsible for system architecture, mentoring junior developers and implementing artificial intelligence solutions.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
